title: Silver Core Stone Competition · Refusal to Give In

scenes.description: 画面淡入,展现云雾缭绕的仙域上空,金色卷轴在空中展开,光芒闪动,背景音乐渐起。

visual.composition: Misty immortal skies with a golden scroll unfurling
visual.environment: Immortal realm sky filled with swirling clouds and golden light
visual.fx: Golden radiance and unfolding scroll effect

scenes.prompt: Xianxia opening, mist-wreathed immortal sky with a golden scroll unfurling, spiritual particles drifting, wide shot, cinematic lighting, 4K
scenes.narration: 我是云卷仙音,欢迎回来。第25集:银芯石之争·寸步不让。

scenes.description: 吕师妹一听银芯石的名字,突然变得惊喜交加,钱师兄虽然一愣但马上反应过来,单手急忙虚空一抓。

visual.composition: Miss Lü hears Silver Core Stone name, suddenly overjoyed, Senior Brother Qian reacts, reaches out with one hand
visual.character_pose: Young cultivator grabbing, woman excited

scenes.prompt: Miss Lü hears Silver Core Stone name, suddenly overjoyed, Senior Brother Qian reacts, reaches out with one hand.
scenes.narration: 吕师妹一听银芯石的名字，突然变得惊喜交加，钱师兄反应过来，单手急忙虚空一抓。

scenes.description: 一股青色霞光直接冲那个装着晶石的锦盒滚滚卷去,韩立听到银芯石名字时面色一动,等到青年出手脸色一沉。

visual.composition: Green light shoots toward crystal box, Han Li's face moves at Silver Core Stone name, darkens when young man acts
visual.character_pose: Han Li alert, green light coming

scenes.prompt: Green light shoots toward crystal box, Han Li's face moves at Silver Core Stone name, darkens when young man acts.
scenes.narration: 一股青色霞光直接冲向装着晶石的锦盒，韩立听到银芯石名字时面色一动，脸色一沉。

scenes.description: 韩立一只手臂一动,嘎巴一声轻响,手臂暴涨数尺,一把将两只锦盒抓到手中。

visual.composition: Han Li's arm moves, cracking sound, arm extends several feet, grabs both boxes in hand
visual.character_pose: Han Li's arm extending, grabbing boxes

scenes.prompt: Han Li's arm moves, cracking sound, arm extends several feet, grabs both boxes in hand.
scenes.narration: 韩立一只手臂一动，嘎巴一声轻响，手臂暴涨数尺，一把将两只锦盒抓到手中。

scenes.description: 这时青霞才堪堪到了跟前,竟然丝毫没有停下之意,直奔韩立身上卷来,想要强行抢回。

visual.composition: Green light reaches Han Li, shows no sign of stopping, rushes toward Han Li to snatch boxes
visual.character_pose: Green light attacking, Han Li holding boxes

scenes.prompt: Green light reaches Han Li, shows no sign of stopping, rushes toward Han Li to snatch boxes.
scenes.narration: 这时青霞才堪堪到了跟前，竟然丝毫没有停下之意，直奔韩立身上卷来，想要抢回。

scenes.description: 韩立冷哼一声,肩膀一晃,身体仿佛弹簧般向后滑出丈许远,同时一只金灿灿手掌对准青霞,一拳击出。

visual.composition: Han Li snorts coldly, shoulder shifts, body slides back like spring, golden palm punches at green light
visual.character_pose: Han Li punching, golden fist

scenes.prompt: Han Li snorts coldly, shoulder shifts, body slides back like spring, golden palm punches at green light.
scenes.narration: 韩立冷哼一声,肩膀一晃,身体仿佛弹簧般向后滑出丈许远,同时一只金灿灿手掌对准青霞,一拳击出。

scenes.description: 噗嗤一声,青霞仿佛纸糊一般就被金色手掌洞穿而过,一下溃灭消失。

visual.composition: Puff sound, green light like paper torn apart by golden palm, instantly destroyed and vanished
visual.character_pose: Golden fist shattering green light

scenes.prompt: Puff sound, green light like paper torn apart by golden palm, instantly destroyed and vanished.
scenes.narration: 噗嗤一声,青霞仿佛纸糊一般就被金色手掌洞穿而过,一下溃灭消失。

scenes.description: 钱师兄原本已经掐诀的双手,在韩立一显现身手后,面色微微一变,变得迟疑起来。

visual.composition: Senior Brother Qian's hands already forming seals, after Han Li shows strength, face changes slightly, becomes hesitant
visual.character_pose: Young man shocked, hesitant

scenes.prompt: Senior Brother Qian's hands already forming seals, after Han Li shows strength, face changes slightly, becomes hesitant.
scenes.narration: 钱师兄原本已经掐诀的双手,在韩立一显现身手后,面色微微一变,变得迟疑起来。

scenes.description: 钱师兄惊道:'高阶炼体士!'吕师妹叫住钱师兄,说可以好好谈谈,无须动手。

visual.composition: Senior Brother Qian exclaims: 'High-level body cultivator!' Miss Lü stops him, says can talk properly, no need to fight
visual.character_pose: Young man shocked, woman stopping him

scenes.prompt: Senior Brother Qian exclaims: 'High-level body cultivator!' Miss Lü stops him, says can talk properly, no need to fight.
scenes.narration: 钱师兄惊道:'高阶炼体士!'吕师妹叫住钱师兄,说可以好好谈谈,无须动手。

scenes.description: 吕师妹聪颖异常地向掌柜问道:'这块银芯石应该还没有卖给这位道友吧,无论什么价格,我都愿意出双倍价钱。'

visual.composition: Miss Lü cleverly asks shopkeeper: 'This Silver Core Stone hasn't been sold yet, whatever price, I'll pay double.'
visual.character_pose: Woman asking, shopkeeper listening

scenes.prompt: Miss Lü cleverly asks shopkeeper: 'This Silver Core Stone hasn't been sold yet, whatever price, I'll pay double.'
scenes.narration: 吕师妹聪颖异常地向掌柜问道:'这块银芯石应该还没有卖给这位道友吧,无论什么价格,我都愿意出双倍价钱。'

scenes.description: 胥老淡淡说道本店不是拍卖行,不是谁出的价高就给谁,而是讲究先来后到,除非韩道友不愿要了。

visual.composition: Xu Lao says calmly shop isn't auction house, not highest bidder wins, but first come first served, unless Han Li doesn't want it
visual.character_pose: Shopkeeper firm, young cultivators listening

scenes.prompt: Xu Lao says calmly shop isn't auction house, not highest bidder wins, but first come first served, unless Han Li doesn't want it.
scenes.narration: 胥老淡淡说道本店不是拍卖行,不是谁出的价高就给谁,而是讲究先来后到,除非韩道友不愿要了。

scenes.description: 韩立头也未抬一下,正将另一只锦盒打开,露出了一块灰扑扑的长方形矿石,表面光滑异常。

visual.composition: Han Li doesn't even look up, opens other box, reveals gray rectangular ore, surface unusually smooth
visual.character_pose: Han Li examining ore, ignoring others

scenes.prompt: Han Li doesn't even look up, opens other box, reveals gray rectangular ore, surface unusually smooth.
scenes.narration: 韩立头也未抬一下,正将另一只锦盒打开,露出了一块灰扑扑的长方形矿石,表面光滑异常。

scenes.description: 钱师兄盯着韩立,缓缓说道:'家师虬龙尊者,这件银芯石是吕师妹必得之物,我替吕师妹付双倍价钱,你将此物让出来。'

visual.composition: Senior Brother Qian stares at Han Li, slowly says: 'My master is Qiu Long Venerable, this Silver Core Stone is necessary for Miss Lü, I'll pay double, give it to us.'
visual.character_pose: Young man threatening, Han Li ignoring

scenes.prompt: Senior Brother Qian stares at Han Li, slowly says: 'My master is Qiu Long Venerable, this Silver Core Stone is necessary for Miss Lü, I'll pay double, give it to us.'
scenes.narration: 钱师兄盯着韩立,缓缓说道:'家师虬龙尊者,这件银芯石是吕师妹必得之物,我替吕师妹付双倍价钱,你将此物让出来。'

scenes.description: 韩立盯着手中的灰色石条,用一根手指轻轻摩擦,眼皮没抬一下,平静说道:'不让!'

visual.composition: Han Li stares at gray stone strip, rubs with finger, doesn't look up, calmly says: 'Won't give it.'
visual.character_pose: Han Li focused on stone, calm

scenes.prompt: Han Li stares at gray stone strip, rubs with finger, doesn't look up, calmly says: 'Won't give it.'
scenes.narration: 韩立盯着手中的灰色石条,用一根手指轻轻摩擦,眼皮没抬一下,平静说道:'不让!'

scenes.description: 钱师兄脸孔变得难看异常,根本没想到韩立会一口回绝,连思量都没有思量一下。

visual.composition: Senior Brother Qian's face becomes ugly, never expected Han Li would refuse outright without thinking
visual.character_pose: Young man shocked, angry

scenes.prompt: Senior Brother Qian's face becomes ugly, never expected Han Li would refuse outright without thinking.
scenes.narration: 钱师兄脸孔变得难看异常,根本没想到韩立会一口回绝,连思量都没有思量一下。

scenes.description: 韩立望了青年一眼,平静说道:'也许这东西真对阁下同伴珍稀异常,但是你怎么知道在下就不需要此物了。'

visual.composition: Han Li looks at young man, calmly says: 'Maybe this item is precious to your companion, but how do you know I don't need it?'
visual.character_pose: Han Li calm, young man frustrated

scenes.prompt: Han Li looks at young man, calmly says: 'Maybe this item is precious to your companion, but how do you know I don't need it?'
scenes.narration: 韩立望了青年一眼,平静说道:'也许这东西真对阁下同伴珍稀异常,但是你怎么知道在下就不需要此物了。'

scenes.description: 钱师兄目光冰冷下来,话语里隐隐带来一丝威胁之意,说道:'我说过了,钱某愿意付双倍的价钱!'

visual.composition: Senior Brother Qian's eyes turn cold, hidden threat in words, says: 'I said, I'm willing to pay double price!'
visual.character_pose: Young man threatening, Han Li unmoved

scenes.prompt: Senior Brother Qian's eyes turn cold, hidden threat in words, says: 'I said, I'm willing to pay double price!'
scenes.narration: 钱师兄目光冰冷下来,话语里隐隐带来一丝威胁之意,说道:'我说过了,钱某愿意付双倍的价钱!'

scenes.description: 韩立叹了一口气,喃喃说道:'在下并不缺灵石,阁下若肯掉头就走,在下宁愿付给阁下一笔灵石。'

visual.composition: Han Li sighs, mutters: 'I'm not short of spirit stones, if you turn and leave, I'd rather pay you some spirit stones.'
visual.character_pose: Han Li mocking, young man angry

scenes.prompt: Han Li sighs, mutters: 'I'm not short of spirit stones, if you turn and leave, I'd rather pay you some spirit stones.'
scenes.narration: 韩立叹了一口气,喃喃说道:'在下并不缺灵石,阁下若肯掉头就走,在下宁愿付给阁下一笔灵石。'

scenes.description: 毫不留情的回话,不但田兴脸色变的苍白无比,就是胥老也不禁露出几分讶色来。

visual.composition: Ruthless reply, not only Tian Xing's face turns pale, even Xu Lao shows surprise
visual.character_pose: Tian Xing pale, old man surprised

scenes.prompt: Ruthless reply, not only Tian Xing's face turns pale, even Xu Lao shows surprise.
scenes.narration: 毫不留情的回话,不但田兴脸色变的苍白无比,就是胥老也不禁露出几分讶色来。

scenes.description: 吕师妹打量了韩立数遍后,突然檀口一张说道:'阁下贵姓,师从那位前辈门下?说不定令师认得家祖呢!'

visual.composition: Miss Lü examines Han Li several times, suddenly asks: 'What's your name, which master do you study under? Maybe your master knows my ancestor!'
visual.character_pose: Woman asking, Han Li calm

scenes.prompt: Miss Lü examines Han Li several times, suddenly asks: 'What's your name, which master do you study under? Maybe your master knows my ancestor!'
scenes.narration: 吕师妹打量了韩立数遍后,突然檀口一张说道:'阁下贵姓,师从那位前辈门下?说不定令师认得家祖呢!'

scenes.description: 韩立一笑,不置可否地说道:'在下一介散人,哪有什么师承。至于姓名不说也罢。'

visual.composition: Han Li smiles, noncommittally says: 'I'm just a wanderer, no master. As for name, doesn't matter.'
visual.character_pose: Han Li smiling, woman listening

scenes.prompt: Han Li smiles, noncommittally says: 'I'm just a wanderer, no master. As for name, doesn't matter.'
scenes.narration: 韩立一笑,不置可否地说道:'在下一介散人,哪有什么师承。至于姓名不说也罢。'

scenes.description: 画面淡出,夜色下的仙城剪影,天空洒落灵光,画面逐渐变暗。

visual.composition: Silhouette of the immortal city beneath night, spiritual light raining from the heavens
visual.environment: Night sky, city silhouette, floating light particles

scenes.prompt: Xianxia ending, immortal city silhouette under the night sky, spiritual particles drifting down, calm mysterious atmosphere, wide shot, cinematic lighting, 4K
scenes.narration: 下一集再见。我是云卷仙音,原著作者忘语。第26集即将开始。
